reviews.review: It's iconic? It's amazing? I loved every minute of playing this game. It offers a fantastic multiplayer with continual creativity in each puzzle and really challenges you to think outside the box sometimes. It manages to be such a likeable game with very few characters, and I love the humour in it, too. A massively enjoyable game, with interesting and somewhat complex puzzles, fantastic backstory, character development (kind of.. moreso in the sense of how particular characters change/ turn against you/ befriend you), and you get to laugh/cry whilst playing it? Who wouldn't love this game?

This is one of the best games I've ever played, and this includes the original Portal. The whole plot is marvelous and unforgettable. If you're looking for a great experience and a classic game, this is surely for ya. Just go play it and I asure you won't regret it. Also you have this multiplayer option which is very intresting and it's very funny to play with pals.
NEEE CO-OP TEAMMATE ADD ME PLEASE. be cool and mature lol

Great game. If you like puzzles at all, this game is a must have.
The story has decent length and the puzzles have enough variety to keep it from getting stale. 
Takes the humor and character that the first game has and builds on it. 
Plays well with controller or kb/mouse. 
I recommend getting both portal games and playing the original first.

I would recommend playing the first one before this although it is not necessary. You play as Chel the portal gun wielding test subject/ prisoner trying to survive the various tests and puzzles you are subjected to but most of all trying to escape

Rating 10/10
Portal two will go down as one of my all time favorite. Everything about it was just great. 

Graphics 9/10
Portal two looks beautiful. Sure it is old but the graphics hold up pretty well and do not hinder the game in any way.

Story 9/10
Enhanced by the first game experience. The story has many twists and turns and remains satisfying the whole way through even with only a handful of characters.

Gameplay 10/10
The puzzles were fun and interesting, although not the most difficult they definitely require some critical thinking.

Its a funny fun story with a simple gimik, make portals to solve puzzles. I've beat it 3 times and it didn't feel repitive once. Also the new co-op mode is hella fun
This was the game that got me into PC gaming. From the story to the character to the scenery this game is an absolute gem!
Hum, quand meme sa fait du bien un jeu comme sa, dommage qu'y ait pas de suite :/

Un indispensable de Steam, Triple B verificado, un referente del gaming.

Completa todos los rubros con exelencia jugabilidad, historia, banda sonora, se acopla a todos los gustos.
El juego de rompecabezas perfecto, con un gran abanico de mapas de comunidad, y facilidad creacion de mapas que puden ser en el modo coop en cual es un monumento

Lo unico malo: no hay un Portal 3
Melhor jogo da minha vida s2

This is one of the best puzzle game i have ever played. Oh geez the co-op is so great and singleplayer is great too. I am not sure which is better. Good story against fun with friend and some kind of good story. This is the kind of game in which i would like to forget story and puzzles and enjoy it over again. 

+puzzles
+story
+coop

-the cake is lie 

11/9

P.S. I like cakes. Mainly chocolate cakes. :)

Thank you Valve, one of the best game you ever made. 
PLEASE MADE THIRD PART!!!!

Portal in the ceiling, portal in the floor. 
10/10 Would have headaches again

Brilliantly crafted expansion on the first Portal game. The single-player experience is phenomenal and had me up late trying to finish it on the first run. The Source engine shines with awesome physics and clean graphics. One of the best games I have every played.
Juego muy divertido, tiene una comunidad en el multijugador muy buena. 100% recomendado.
A great all round game. It is really fun in small portions so don't spend too long on it or you won't want to play it.
one of the best games i've ever played on both console and PC. beautifully crafted.
May be old but worth every penny.
Quite the fun game, especially if you liked the original Portal.
